question.long: Is hydroxychloroquine an effective treatment for COVID-19?

description: Results from studies evaluating the impact of hydroxychloroquine on symptoms or death from COVID-19.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of hydroxychloroquine on COVID-19

no.description: The literature suggests that hydroxychloroquine does not treat COVID-19

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that hydroxychloroquine probably doesn't treat COVID-19, but more research is needed

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that hydroxychloroquine likely treats COVID-19, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that hydroxychloroquine treats COVID-19

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of hydroxychloroquine on COVID-19

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of hydroxychloroquine on COVID-19, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall effect of hydroxychloroquine on COVID-19, but there are mixed results on specific cases

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that hydroxychloroquine might have an effect on COVID-19, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that hydroxychloroquine may treat COVID-19, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that hydroxychloroquine may have a small effect on COVID-19

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that hydroxychloroquine may treat COVID-19, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that hydroxychloroquine treats COVID-19
